# [Interview #811: JordanCon 2012 - Terez, Entry #14](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=811#14)

#### Terez

#### Maria Simons

Maria told an interesting story about a cockroach infestation in the carriage house, which she says inspired the bubble of evil in
*The Gathering Storm*
.
